actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to accelerate the effective date of the recently enacted increase in social security benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Makes the cost of living increase in Title II social security benefits (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) effective beginning in months after December 1973 (presently after May 1974). (Amends P.L. 93-66)

titles.title: A bill to accelerate the effective date of the recently enacted increase in social security benefits.
